sourcesContent:
Add Module

Module name is required.
Credit is required.
Please enter a valid number for credit.
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ServiceModuleService } from 'src/app/services/service-module.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-module', templateUrl: './module.component.html', styleUrls: ['./module.component.css'] }) export class ModuleComponent { constructor(private serviceModule: ServiceModuleService, private router: Router){} module = { nameModule: '', credit: '' }; addModule() : void { this.serviceModule.createModule(this.module).subscribe(response => { console.log('Module Added successfully', response); this.router.navigate(['/moduleList']); }, error => { console.error('There was an error!', error); }); } }
